name: Ratatouille Grilled Cheese Sandwiches
author: Juliana Hale
summary: Whether made fresh or leftover, roasted ratatouille-style vegetables not only lend exciting flavor to these Gouda grilled cheese sandwiches but also boost the nutrition factor.
ingredients: 8 (1/2 inch thick) slices soft Italian bread
8 ounces thinly sliced young goat Gouda cheese
1 ⅓ cups Sheet-Pan Ratatouille, or other prepared ratatouille
directions: Spread both sides of each bread slice with mayonnaise
Layer 1/2 of the cheese, all of the ratatouille, and remaining cheese on 4 bread slices
Heat an extra-large skillet, grill pan, or griddle over medium heat
Cook sandwiches until golden and cheese melts, 2 to 3 minutes per side
